title: "Machine-learning based prediction of Cushing’s syndrome in dogs attending UK primary-care veterinary practice"
excerpt: "Cushing’s syndrome is an endocrine disease in dogs that negatively impacts upon the quality-of-life of affected animals. Cushing’s syndrome can be a challenging diagnosis to confirm, therefore new methods to aid diagnosis are warranted."
